meanings.definition: Most pleasing to the taste; delicious.
meanings.sent1: The cake was the yummiest dessert at the party.
meanings.sent2: I think chocolate is the yummiest flavor of ice cream.
meanings.sent3: The yummiest cookies in the jar mysteriously disappeared overnight.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was the yummiest melody I had ever heard.
meanings.sent5: The yummiest smell of freshly baked bread filled the kitchen.

meanings.sent1: The yummiest dress in the store caught my eye.
meanings.sent2: The puppy with the yummiest eyes found a forever home quickly.
meanings.sent3: The yummiest painting in the gallery seemed to follow me around.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was the yummiest sunshine on a rainy day.
meanings.sent5: The yummiest flower in the garden stood out among the rest.
